channel.title: Alot of leeched servers?
channel.description: Well I was bored of coding, attempting to create a pvp following.. but still no luck, so I decided to look around on moparscape's server status for some decent pk servers to, well you know pk on. When I noticed just about every server has everything, and I mean EVERYTHING the same. Why are there so many leeching noobs? and lmao most of them get donations?

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

If you put it on the internet without copyrights(real one), its free for other peoples use.

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?

@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:1, topic:346509”]Well I was bored of coding, attempting to create a pvp following… but still no luck, so I decided to look around on moparscape’s server status for some decent pk servers to, well you know pk on.
When I noticed just about every server has everything, and I mean EVERYTHING the same.
Why are there so many leeching noobs?
and lmao most of them get donations?[/quote]

Play battle-scape pk, its the only original/creative server out there.

Read full topic

It happens when uneducated individuals get a hold of open source software.

item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn

@LKCTheReturn wrote:

well it’s been awhile since i’ve really checked the serverstatus page… but i don’t remember this many leechers

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

rsps has always been 6 - 7 good programmers. that make a source and release it. than everyone and there dog has it. its nothing new. i remember when every server was allstarscape or figmentscape good times good times

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:11, topic:346509”][quote author=LKCTheReturn link=topic=442890.msg3252359#msg3252359 date=1277859946]

In my opinion everyone leeches because, practically everyone on MoparScape uses DeltaScape or Devo or something like that.

Well somewhat, the only thing is…
Just about every server on the list… has only changed shop locations, spawns, and exp rates… oh yeah don’t forget the name. lol

Its because that is the only thing most of RSPS hosters actually know how to do. So, why not do what you can, to give it that 2% uniqueness, rather than learn what you can before hosting it. I personally did that when I first started, but i have my reason for that…

MY REASON - Its because I wanted to get opinions from the players, before making a new thing, or getting rid of something. I find it better to have a community formed server, rather than one from the eyes of the hoster.

But most of the hosters on the serverstatus hasn’t really changed anything, and they have been there for awhile…
If you log onto the server they will claim they created it all… or pretty close to every feature on the server, mostly what I am saying is they should give credit, where credit it due…
[/quote]

They should, but its a fact of life. People will claim anything they can outta something thats possible to do it with to make themselves feel better about it. Everybody is guilty of it at least once in their life, whether it was a mistake (talking about something, and point at the wrong thing), or on purpose, it happens to everyone sometime.

@jmood - Ive done that to several people. I had their MSN, so i just nulled the server till they unbanned me. (they claimed i couldnt…)[/quote]

I believe that there should be a rule, so that they must claim what the base was or at least the creator… and that doesn’t mean track it back to it’s original roots…
as in if they download an allstar, changed a few things…
at least state that it’s allstar based in the beginning…
I mean if I someone stole, or copied a server you made and released, claimed every single credit for creating it…
i’m sure you wont be like, it’s all cool…
no you will be like: WTF is the shizz?

Read full topic

Its because that is the only thing most of RSPS hosters actually know how to do. So, why not do what you can, to give it that 2% uniqueness, rather than learn what you can before hosting it. I personally did that when I first started, but i have my reason for that…

Everybody is guilty of it at least once in their life, whether it was a mistake (talking about something, and point at the wrong thing), or on purpose, it happens to everyone sometime.

@jmood - Ive done that to several people. I had their MSN, so i just nulled the server till they unbanned me. (they claimed i couldnt…)[/quote]

Dude, I look for servers that use the sources with out a ip cap or are pretty much allstar.

Read full topic

I was like “dude your ling this is allstar scape I bet you don’t know how to change what the npc’s say”, they banned me after I said that.

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Well im not getting worked up, it’s just they are receiving pretty much, money and credit for other users work.
Which could be considered the same thing as selling staff powers, you know.
donate = powerful item
donate = mod

same thing they get power out of donating to some lazy kid?
seems like the same as the selling admins and mods to me…

the only thing i believe should be sold is memberships.

all i am saying is they either shouldn’t be sponsored, or they should be required to give the creator credit… you know?

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:3, topic:346509”]Yeah, but seeing as they become the “sponsored” servers…
I do not think they should become sponsored unless they are, or have a larger amount of uniqueness to them.
seeing as the 1st page contains mainly 2-3 different leeched servers.
so 16 or so servers with the same leeched source[/quote]

It’s not the source, it’s how people manage them, if they have a good staff base and good people that play and monitor the server and come up with the money for sponsored servers, why care mate? theres no point getting worked up over something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Yeah, but seeing as they become the “sponsored” servers…
I do not think they should become sponsored unless they are, or have a larger amount of uniqueness to them.
seeing as the 1st page contains mainly 2-3 different leeched servers.
so 16 or so servers with the same leeched source

item.title: Alot of leeched servers?

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

LKCTheReturn:

and lmao most of them get donations?

307,117 members are on this forum, you don’t need to register to go on topics and download things, we have people who aren’t even registered downloading stuff.

It’s life, everyone wants something and everybody wants the quick way. Just take a look around the website and see for yourself.

Read full topic
